column4: can someone help me figure out why ubuntu freezes up so much on me...its a fresh install and its frozen up over 10 times in a day....never any freezes in windows on same machine
how do I find out what is causing ubuntu to freeze on a fresh install on edgy?
does ubuntu support dual channel ram?
run the memory check program on the live cd
of course, put the ram in the slots closest to the cpu...
is that true..try moving the ram to the slots closest to the cpu....i think its in 1,3 now to enable dual channel
it could help, although might not. it's just something i learned going through a+ cert
yeah. you might have bad ram. does your board support mem tests?
does it display key shortcuts as post?
it goes through random numbers, then reading/writing byte patters
the last mem test i did, and this well obviously depend on your hardware, was about 30 minutes
can't recall if it's the overall, or just for that specific test
